mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hms_board (member_id, content, tag) values (#{writerNo}, #{content}, #{tag})
mapper.select: select b.board_id, b.content, b.tag, b.view_cnt, b.created_date, m.photo from hms_board b inner join hms_photo m on b.board_id = m.board_id

select b.board_id, b.content, b.view_cnt, b.created_date, m.photo from hms_board b inner join hms_photo m on b.board_id = m.board_id inner join hms_member a on b.member_id = a.member_id where b.member_id = #{no}

select b.board_id, b.content, b.tag, b.view_cnt, b.created_date, m.photo, s.nickname, s.profile_photo, c.comment_id, c.writer_email, c.cmt_content, c.created_date from hms_board b inner join hms_photo m on b.board_id = m.board_id left outer join hms_comment c on b.board_id = c.board_id inner join hms_member s on b.member_id = s.member_id where b.board_id=#{no}
